alert.note: Alert for Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 14 at 10:32AM CST until November 15 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Wintry precipitation will spread into southeast Oklahoma this afternoon and into northwest Arkansas by early evening. Rain will likely transition to a rain, snow mix or all snow across portions of the advisory area, primarily in the higher terrain. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches is expected. * WHERE...Pittsburg County. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...A brief period of heavy wet snow could create slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 1-844-465-4997 or go to okRoads.org.
